selected_quotes: The research paper on this work is available to read for free here
Ever wondered what's going on inside a Li-ion battery as it undergoes thermal runaway?
What happens to your Li-ion #battery when it overheats: Read the paper here for free
High-speed x-ray and CT imaging of lithium-ion batteries during thermal runaway.

citation.abstract: Prevention and mitigation of thermal runaway presents one of the greatest challenges for the safe operation of lithium-ion batteries. Here, we demonstrate for the first time the application of high-speed synchrotron X-ray computed tomography and radiography, in conjunction with thermal imaging, to track the evolution of internal structural damage and thermal behaviour during initiation and propagation of thermal runaway in lithium-ion batteries. This diagnostic approach is applied to commercial lithium-ion batteries (LG 18650 NMC cells), yielding insights into key degradation modes including gas-induced delamination, electrode layer collapse and propagation of structural degradation. It is envisaged that the use of these techniques will lead to major improvements in the design of Li-ion batteries and their safety features.
citation.title: In-operando high-speed tomography of lithium-ion batteries during thermal runaway

news.title: This Is What Happens Inside and Out When a Li-On Battery Explodes
news.summary: When a lithium-ion battery begins to overheat, it can get caught up in a vicious cycle known as thermal runaway—causing it to explode and catch fire. Now, researchers have imaged what happens inside and out the battery to understand the process. Read more.

news.title: Brennende Lithium-Batterien: Explosion bei über tausend Grad
news.summary: Innerhalb weniger Tage brannten 2013 in gleich zwei Boeing-Flugzeugen die Batterien. Nun haben Forscher gefilmt, was beim Überhitzen im Inneren von Akkus passiert. Am Ende gab es eine farbenfrohe Explosion.

author.name: Txchnologist
author.description:
Txchnologist is an online magazine sponsored by GE. Every week, we offer an optimistic, but not utopian, take on the future and humanity’s ability to tackle the great challenges of our era through industry, technology and ingenuity.

We cover science and technology with an eye toward what is possible now and what will be tomorrow in renewable energy, transportation, infrastructure, artificial intelligence and other topics. Txchnologist will offer a blend of stories and visuals that communicate the ideas that will shape societies, from the developing world to our frenetic and growing cities.

Txchnologist, while sponsored by GE, takes a broader look at the world of science and technology. The stories and opinions do not necessarily reflect the views of the company.

We hope you’ll join the conversation in the comments section and share our stories on Twitter, Facebook, or Google Plus.

wikipedia.title: Thermal runaway
wikipedia.summary: Thermal runaway refers to a situation where an increase in temperature changes the conditions in a way that causes a further increase in temperature, often leading to a destructive result.
